login.title: Login.
login.dont-have-account: Don't have an account? Sign up.
login.send-reset-code: We will send a reset code to
login.enter-new-password: Please enter a new password for your account, and enter the code you received via email.

signup.title: Create account.
signup.password-error-msg: The passwords you entered do not match. Please make sure both passwords are the same.

verify.sent-email: We have sent a verification code to
verify.didnt-receive:
You didn't receive the code? 
 Please check your spam folder.

onboarding.pick-your-plan-msg: Built on the leading 5G network in the US.
onboarding.get-number-msg: We’ll assign you a number when we activate your subscripton.
onboarding.bring-your-number-msg: Request a number transfer now or once your plan is active. It’s up to you.
onboarding.we-are-sorry-msg:
The number you have entered is not eligible for a transfer. We propose to activate a new number.
Or contact your previous carrier to make your number transferable.
onboarding.enter-number-wish-transfer: Enter the number you wish to transfer to mobile Inc.
onboarding.enter-account-information: Please enter the account information your previous carrier associates with this number.
onboarding.How-get-data: How do I get this data
onboarding.lorem: Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Ea dolorum enim cum qui, excepturi nisi culpa amet sit totam maxime ipsum quia odio repellat nihil iusto at qui possimus?
onboarding.request-received-msg: We’ll submit the transfer request to your previous carrier once your onboarding to mobile Inc. is complete.
onboarding.esim-description: eSIM is the fastest and easiest way to activate your subscription.
onboarding.psim-description: You’ll receive your SIM card within a few business days, free of charge.

home.change-plan-title: You have requested to change this plan.
home.important-msg: By confirming the reactivation, your plan will be restored with its original features, conditions, and associated phone number. It will become active with order confirmation and renew every 30 days.
home.add-plan-msg: Earn 10% bitcoin rewards on any additional plan added to your account.
home.install-your-esim-now-msg: To start using your plan, install your eSIM by clicking 'INSTALL ESIM' below.

account.credit-balance-subtilte2: The funds are being used to pay your monthly bills.
account.address-settings-confirm-description: Please note: No changes to the SIM card will be possible for 30 days after updating your address. Do you still want to proceed?
account.email-settings-description: We'll keep you updated via email on news and offers regarding mobile Inc. and its products. You can choose here if you want to keep receive these communications or stop them.
account.email-settings-description2: We’ll continue to contact you for important information about your orders and subscriptions with us.
account.address-settings-description: Your address has been updated successfully.
account.mail-settings-description: We'll keep you updated via mail on news and offers regarding mobile Inc. and its products. You can choose here if you want to keep receive these communications or stop them.
account.mail-settings-description2: We'll continue to contact you for important information about your orders and subscriptions with us.
account.sms-settings-description: We'll keep you updated via SMS on news and offers regarding mobile Inc. and its products. You can choose here if you want to keep receive these communications or stop them.
account.sms-settings-description2: We'll continue to contact you for important information about your orders and subscriptions with us.
account.cpni-deactivated-usage: You are about to deactivate CPNI usage.
account.cpni-deactivated-usage-msg: You’re about to turn off the use of your Customer Proprietary Network Information (CPNI) for marketing. Here is what it means:
account.cpni-settings-description: If you wish to restrict mobile Inc.'s use of your Customer Proprietary Network Information ('CPNI') for the purposes of offering new types of products and services, please uncheck the approval box below.
account.cpni-settings-description2: I approve mobile Inc's use of my CPNI for marketing purposes:

wallets.title: Your account balance.
wallets.description: The mobile Inc. wallet is temporarily unavailable as we upgrade the underlying protocol and add new features. Don’t worry — your balance is safe and you’ll still continue earning cashback during this time. Thanks for your patience!
wallets.invalid-seed: The entered phrase seems to be invalid.
wallets.transfer-failed: The transfer failed. Please try again.
